item.description:
Work from Henry's most recent book, SHOW. Photographs of burlesque and performance.

Exhibit from Jan. 22 - Feb. 28

Opening on First Friday, Feb. 5

http://www.facebook.c...


Host: Henry Horenstein Photography
Date: Friday, February 5, 2010
Time: 5:00pm - 9:00pm
Location: Walker Contemporary, Boston, MA
Street: 450 Harrison Avenue
City/Town: Boston, MA

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Burlesque Photography SHOW Opening
